content.question:
Experts often debunk popular sleep myths such as, “Your brain and body can learn to function just as well with less sleep.” This is intended to help the public understand healthy habits related to sleep. Even with this evidence, some individuals dismiss the experts and continue with their unhealthy sleep habits thinking this is what works best.
Which of the following is demonstrated in this example?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
